name: Anvay Varerkar
about: Interested in Software Development, Data Science, Algorithmic Trading and Quantitative Finance. Passionate about using technology to expand work capabilities.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: •	Worked on Django's REST APIs for feature development, authentication, throttling; end focus on unit testing of services•	Built containerised applications using Docker Compose and Networks, ensuring a uniform environment in development•	Engineered a 90% reduction in the processing time of tasks using asynchronous handling with Celery and RabbitMQ•	Integrated Firebase Remote Config, RSA, AES encryption for MPIN transfer; implemented TOTP for admin authentication•	Developed an AWS Lambda function to create a webhook; configured Jenkins for one – click deployment to AWS EC2
experience.description_html: • Worked on Django's REST APIs for feature development, authentication, throttling; end focus on unit testing of services• Built containerised applications using Docker Compose and Networks, ensuring a uniform environment in development• Engineered a 90% reduction in the processing time of tasks using asynchronous handling with Celery and RabbitMQ• Integrated Firebase Remote Config, RSA, AES encryption for MPIN transfer; implemented TOTP for admin authentication• Developed an AWS Lambda function to create a webhook; configured Jenkins for one – click deployment to AWS EC2

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Worked on Sales Forecasting and Time Series Analysis to predict future sales to Piramal Pharmaceuticals customers to help with inventory management and production.Used Python, Keras and other libraries.

positions.subtitle: Student Alumni Relations Cell
positions.description: Worked in a 6 member team to implement the ASMP Programme for students of the institute. Managed a pool of 450+ Alumni mentors and 600+ students.The Alumni Student Mentorship Programme is an initiative to provide guidance from the alumni to the students of IIT Bombay.
positions.title: ASMP Team Member
positions.description_html:
Worked in a 6 member team to implement the ASMP Programme for students of the institute. Managed a pool of 450+ Alumni mentors and 600+ students.
The Alumni Student Mentorship Programme is an initiative to provide guidance from the alumni to the students of IIT Bombay.

experience.title: Big Data Analyst
experience.description: Worked in the Data Analytics Warehouse of the Bombay Stock Exchange with Hadoop implementations to manage large amounts of data. Worked with PySpark, Hive, Impala-shell and HDFS to implement a K-Means clustering algorithm on customer data.
